trends: There have been no other sightings in Bloomfield Township
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsif the object was a shooting star it was very low to the ground (appox 1\4 mile). it appeared to be moving\falling(?) parallel to ground level. it was a bright white\yellowish ball with distinct & very "tight\short" commet tail following. it did not appear to "break apart" but just vanish. as soon as i picked it up (the object visually)i followed it w\out blinking & in 2 seconds - gone. nothing was obstructing my view. obviously i thought it might not be a shooting star because of height from ground, intense brightness & decent pattern. i think this might be the same object the other michigan reporter from the troy location saw on the 28th - seeing troy is ne of where i live\saw the "object". unlike the troy,mi report, i never saw a ufo next to, near or around the shooting star like object that i have just described. later that evening i went back out side to...look. nothing thank you.
Summary: i know i saw a "shooting-star" like object directly over my head as i was walking NNE with my dog.
